questions.question: A machine learning engineer needs to set up a solution for storing and managing files that are frequently accessed initially but then rarely accessed. The engineer wants to minimize storage costs while ensuring files remain available. Which solution is MOST appropriate for this scenario?
options: Store the files in S3 One Zone-IA storage class and manually delete them after 30 days.
Store the files in S3 Standard storage class and manually move them to Glacier Deep Archive after 30 days.
Store the files in S3 Standard-IA storage class and set up a lifecycle rule to transition them to S3 Glacier after 30 days.
Store the files in S3 Intelligent-Tiering stora
correct_answers: Store the files in S3 Standard-IA storage class and set up a lifecycle rule to transition them to S3 Glacier after 30 days.
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate MLA-C01
